item.title: Hello There
item.description: For quite a while, I’ve been “working on” a personal website, letting perfect be the enemy of good and having nothing to show for it, but no more!

item.title: About
item.description: Hello there! Welcome to my corner of the internet. I’m Edmund Goodman, and I’m currently doing my year in industry as a CAD design verification intern at Apple, away from my BSc in Computer Science at the University of Warwick. In my free time, I enjoy playing the trumpet, rock climbing, and working on various side projects – some of which I finish!
